metadata.title: CVE-2020-13336 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: An issue has been discovered in GitLab affecting versions from 11.8 before12.10.13. GitLab was vulnerable to a stored XSS by in the error trackingfeature.

criterions.comment: gitlab: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
